alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 12:07PM MST until January 13 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Light to moderate snow will continue this afternoon into tonight with 1-2 inches of accumulation and ice accumulations of a light glaze. The main impact will be to the Flathead Valley with less impact in the Mission Valley. Beginning around sunset, the primary concern is for black ice formation on untreated wet surfaces. Given the cold ground temperatures, ice may form even with above freezing air temperatures. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially secondary roads and sidewalks.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
